meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1207.

td.p: Patti Van Benthuysen, an editor from Los Angeles, California
Jeff Slike, an ATM repairman originally from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
Nancy Janow, a cooking instructor from Sotuh Orange, New Jersey

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
FLORAL QUOTES
FORESTS
FRUITS
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
CINDERELLA
